languages.text: "Да-да. Только, надеюсь, экипаж перестанет штормить всякий раз, когда Кас соизволит по мостику пройтись".
"Mmmhmm. I just hope the crew will stop flying into a tizzy every time Cass deigns to walk across the bridge."
languages.original_text: "Да-да. Только, надеюсь, экипаж перестанет штормить всякий раз, когда Кас соизволит по мостику пройтись".

traits.locale_text: "Mmmhmm. I just hope the crew will stop flying into a tizzy every time Cass deigns to walk across the bridge."

traits.locale_text: "Mmmhmm. I just hope the crew will stop flying into a tizzy every time Cass deigns to walk across the bridge."

languages.text: “嗯嗯嗯……我只希望，每当小卡要屈尊走过舰桥时，船员们不会被吓得惊慌失措。”
languages.original_text: "Mmmhmm. I just hope the crew will stop flying into a tizzy every time Cass deigns to walk across the bridge."

traits.locale_text: “嗯嗯嗯……我只希望，每当小卡要屈尊走过舰桥时，船员们不会被吓得惊慌失措。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « Mmmhmm. J'espère juste que l'équipage va un jour arrêter de paniquer chaque fois que Cass se pointe sur le pont. »
languages.original_text: "Mmmhmm. I just hope the crew will stop flying into a tizzy every time Cass deigns to walk across the bridge."

traits.locale_text: « Mmmhmm. J'espère juste que l'équipage va un jour arrêter de paniquer chaque fois que Cass se pointe sur le pont. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Mmmhmm. Ich hoffe nur, dass die Crew nicht jedes Mal völlig außer sich gerät, wenn Cass sich dazu herablässt, auf die Brücke zu kommen."
languages.original_text: "Mmmhmm. I just hope the crew will stop flying into a tizzy every time Cass deigns to walk across the bridge."

traits.locale_text: "Mmmhmm. Ich hoffe nur, dass die Crew nicht jedes Mal völlig außer sich gerät, wenn Cass sich dazu herablässt, auf die Brücke zu kommen."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「そうね。私としては、キャスがブリッジを歩くたびに、クルーが浮き足立つのをやめてくれるといいのだけど」
languages.original_text: "Mmmhmm. I just hope the crew will stop flying into a tizzy every time Cass deigns to walk across the bridge."

traits.locale_text: 「そうね。私としては、キャスがブリッジを歩くたびに、クルーが浮き足立つのをやめてくれるといいのだけど」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «Ajá. Solo espero que la tripulación deje de entrar en pánico cada vez que Cass se digna a cruzar el puente».
languages.original_text: "Mmmhmm. I just hope the crew will stop flying into a tizzy every time Cass deigns to walk across the bridge."

traits.locale_text: «Ajá. Solo espero que la tripulación deje de entrar en pánico cada vez que Cass se digna a cruzar el puente».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.original_text: "Mmmhmm. I just hope the crew will stop flying into a tizzy every time Cass deigns to walk across the bridge."

languages.text: "Hıhımm. Temennim, Cass lütfedip köprüden her geçtiğinde mürettebatın telaşa kapılmaması."
languages.original_text: "Mmmhmm. I just hope the crew will stop flying into a tizzy every time Cass deigns to walk across the bridge."

traits.locale_text: "Hıhımm. Temennim, Cass lütfedip köprüden her geçtiğinde mürettebatın telaşa kapılmaması."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion
